describe: Bosnia and Herzegovina is a country located in Southeastern Europe on the Balkan Peninsula. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse landscapes, and historical significance. The country has a complex history and is home to a mix of ethnic groups, including Bosniaks, Serbs, and Croats.

cities.name: 🏔 Sarajevo
cities.geographical_location: Located in the central part of the country, surrounded by the Dinaric Alps.
cities.climate: Sarajevo has a continental climate with cold winters and warm summers.

cities.name: 🌉 Mostar
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the southern part of Bosnia and Herzegovina, along the Neretva River.
cities.climate: Mostar has a Mediterranean climate with hot summers and mild, wet winters.

cities.name: 🏰 Banja Luka
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northwestern part of the country, on the Vrbas River.
cities.climate: Banja Luka experiences a moderate continental climate with warm summers and cold winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Banja Luka-style Ćevapi, Grah, and Kvrguša.
